week2.practice1_html:
What it is

Step-by-step implementation

  1. Set aside 10 minutes â€” ideally morning or before bed, somewhere you wonâ€™t be interrupted.

  4. Anchor the calm: Right after, place a hand gently over your heart and think, â€œMy body is healing; new growth is forming.â€
  5. Practice daily â€” pairing this with your windâ€‘down or morning routine builds powerful rhythm.

week2.practice2_html:

week2.practice3_html:
What it is
